name: Knight vs Giant: The Broken Excalibur - Prologue

description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/715680

This prologue to Knight vs Giant: The Broken Excalibur offers you a first look into the world of the legendary action roguelite.
Take on the role of King Arthur and defeat monstrous giants, enemies and mini-bosses tyrannising the kingdom of Camelot as you traverse its beautifully hand-drawn map. Explore the first stage of this glorious adventure based on the Arthurian legend of the Knights of the Round Table.

THE STORY
The kingdom of Camelot has been destroyed by giants who brought chaos about the land and its people, leading the wizard Merlin to attempt to banish the nefarious creatures from the kingdom. Little did he know, his spell would transport its ruins and survivors to the Astral Dimension. A brave knight and his broken sword must now find a way to defeat the giants and monsters scattered around the Astral Dimension and return Camelot to its former glory on Earth.
